price: 18. Mokolo wana bokozongisaka nyoso epai ya Allah, bokobombaka eloko moko te.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُعۡرَضُونَ لَا تَخۡفَىٰ مِنكُمۡ خَافِيَةٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin tuʿ'raḍūna lā takhfā minkum khāfiyatun
